thread.title: Smokers not performing

author: news24.com
title: Smokers not performing
text:
The article named "Do smokers make bad employees?" refers.
The reporter completely misses the point
The writer pretends that smokers have some kind of inferiority over non smokers.
Sorry I cannot accept that inference.
Smoking has nothing to do with the way we do our jobs.
It is the same as referring to gay people as lesser good workers.
I do my job the same if not better as any of my non smoking colleagues. Please accept the challenge that I do my job at an exceptional level of quality and quantity.
The article is purely speculative. Smoking is a choice of modern living. Tough if you choose to smoke or not.
It does not matter if we smoke or not, the branding of smokers as inferior workers is not on
The stats provided does not mean anything. No proof exists the we do not do our jobs properly.
I dare anybody to provide evidence.
I always say that I would accept everything the way it has happened in my life except maybe for the smoking.
If I had it all over again I would perhaps maybe choose not to smoke.
To all non smokers, what is your vice? After all we all have our vices. Chewing your nails, picking your nose or whatever?
Does this mean that we do our jobs differently? Just asking.
To the reporter, please get something worth writing about
